trans-unit.source: The BMR module can be used on bootable media such as CDs, DVDs, or USB flash drives. The bootable file delivered with the product should be kept in a convenient location and readily available in the event of a BMR operation.

seg-source.mrk: The BMR module can be used on bootable media such as CDs, DVDs, or USB flash drives.
The bootable file delivered with the product should be kept in a convenient location and readily available in the event of a BMR operation.

target.mrk: Le module BMR peut être utilisé sur des supports amorçables tels que les CD, les DVD ou les clés USB.
Le fichier de démarrage fourni avec le produit doit être conservé dans un endroit approprié et facilement disponible en cas d'opération BMR.

trans-unit.source: The firmware between the machine you backed up and the machine you are restoring to must be identical (i.e., BIOS, EFI, UEFI).

seg-source.mrk: The firmware between the machine you backed up and the machine you are restoring to must be identical (i.e., BIOS, EFI, UEFI).

target.mrk: Le firmware entre la machine que vous avez sauvegardé et la machine à restaurer doit être identique (c'est-à-dire BIOS, EFI, UEFI).

trans-unit.source: Before starting the BMR process, you must:

seg-source.mrk: Before starting the BMR process, you must:

target.mrk: Avant de démarrer le processus BMR, vous devez :

trans-unit.source: Check the Protect the system with BMR option in the protection scheme.

seg-source.mrk: Check the Protect the system with BMR option in the protection scheme.

target.mrk: Cocher l'option Protéger le système avec le BMR dans le programme de protection.

trans-unit.source: Obtain a <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_cross_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> token for each agent to recreate. For more information, see <MadCap:xref href="Restore_Token.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Restore Tokens</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: Obtain a <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_cross_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> token for each agent to recreate.
For more information, see <MadCap:xref href="Restore_Token.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Restore Tokens</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Obtenir un jeton de <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_cross_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> pour chaque agent à reconstruire.
Pour plus d’informations, consultez <MadCap:xref href="Restore_Token.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Restore Tokens</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: If Bitlocker encryption is supported you must use new disks or you have to format the existing disks before proceeding with the restore.

seg-source.mrk: If Bitlocker encryption is supported you must use new disks or you have to format the existing disks before proceeding with the restore.

target.mrk: Si le cryptage Bitlocker est pris en charge, vous devez utiliser de nouveaux disques ou formater les disques existants avant de procéder à la restauration.
